select t1.pallet_no,t1.rfid_no,t1.paint_code,t1.pallet_type,t1.pallet_name, CASE t1.used_flag WHEN '1' THEN '启用' WHEN '0' THEN '停用' END AS used_flag, t1.pallet_weight,t1.product_guid,t1.last_product_guid,t1.binding_time, CASE t1.load_status WHEN 1 THEN '有载' WHEN 0 THEN '空载' END AS load_status, CASE t1.error_status WHEN '1' THEN '异常' WHEN '0' THEN '正常' END AS error_status, CASE t1.checkout_status WHEN '1' THEN '超差' WHEN '0' THEN '正常' END AS checkout_status, t1.dequip_code,t1.dlog_no, CASE t1.slms_flag WHEN '0' THEN '复位' WHEN '1' THEN '新增' WHEN '2' THEN '修改' WHEN '3' THEN '删除' END AS slms_flag from VIEW_PALLET t1
T1.PALLET_NO LIKE '%'||#where.PALLET_NO#||'%'
T1.RFID_NO LIKE '%'||#where.RFID_NO#||'%'
T1.PALLET_NAME LIKE '%'||#where.PALLET_NAME#||'%'
T1.LOAD_STATUS = #where.LOAD_STATUS#
T1.ERROR_STATUS = #where.ERROR_STATUS#
T1.CHECKOUT_STATUS = #where.CHECKOUT_STATUS#
ORDER BY t1.rfid_no

select t1.* from VIEW_PALLET t1
T1.PALLET_NO = #where.PALLET_NO#
SELECT '1' AS sskey, '有载' AS ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT '0', '空载' FROM dual
SELECT '1' AS sskey, '异常' AS ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT '0', '正常' FROM dual
SELECT '1' AS sskey, '超差' AS ssValue FROM dual UNION SELECT '0', '正常' FROM dual
